name: Kill enemies in specific order -> Secret.
author: Alucard648
description: Enemies in that screen must be killed in specific order to trigger secrets.
setup: Place invisible FFC anywhere in the screen.Set "Enemies always return" screen flag. No flag-spawned enemies, like Zoras, shooters, and, such. Only enemies in list are supported. D0 to D4 - Enemy order password. Read enemy positions in ZQuest editor, staering from top.   D0 #####.____ - #1, ____.#### - #2  D1 #####.____ - #3, ____.#### - #4 etc.
